#summary Implicit Objects

= EasyGSP Implicit Objects =

Every gsp script and controller has implicit objects(and methods) available to them.  

				

|| *Object* || *Description* ||
|| request || HttpServletRequest object||
|| response || the HttpServletResponse object ||
|| application || the ServletContext object ||
|| context || same as application||
|| session || convenience object `request.getSession(*false*)` - can be null! ||
|| headers || Map that contains all request headers ||
|| params || Map that contains all querystring and form parameters||
